title: Chapter 1205 - Illuminating Stars
volume_title: Sword In Hand, He Stands Above The Wilds, Sovereign Throughout The Ages
body:
Chapter 1205 - Illuminating Stars

The Laws of Flying Light and the Dark and Gold Fortune Vine, combined with peak Profound Unity Realm cultivation, let Su Yi kill a late-stage Heavenly Longevity Realm World King in a single slash!

His attack was so direct and crisp that it left the spirit sparrow unwittingly stunned. “Over the years, I’ve seen countless miraculous geniuses, but this is my first time seeing someone like you. You’re a young man in the Imperial Realm, but you just killed a Heavenly Longevity World King!”

Su Yi laughed. “You haven’t seen anyone like me, because before me, there was no one like me. Going forward… I’m afraid there won’t be any others, either.”

The spirit sparrow laughed coldly. “Unprecedented and unsurpassable? In terms of bragging, maybe! I’m not afraid to tell you that in ancient times, Venerate Flooding Heavens killed a World King while still in the Imperial Realm too!”

“Oh?” said Su Yi. “And could he contend with Oneness World Kings?”

“Err…” The sparrow hesitated.

“I’m sure you saw it too. When I entered the secret origin grounds, six Enforcers surrounded me, but here I am. Do you think Venerate Flooding Heavens could have done that when he was in the Imperial...
